item.title: 消息人士称，X 与 Visa 达成支付协议，向马斯克的 "一切应用 "目标迈进
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周二告诉路透社，支付巨头 Visa 和埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司正在合作，为社交媒体应用程序的客户提供直接支付解决方案。【原文：Payments giant Visa and Elon Musk's X are partnering to offer direct payment solutions to customers of the social media app, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 桥水认为科技股短期调整，但看好 DeepSeek 的影响
item.description: 对冲基金经理桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）表示，中国初创公司DeepSeek推出最新人工智能（AI）模型，可能会导致许多科技公司股价出现短期回调，但对整个行业来说是积极的。【原文：Hedge fund manager Bridgewater Associates said Chinese startup DeepSeek's launch of its latest artificial intelligence (AI) models could lead to a short-term correction in many tech companies' share prices but is positive for the industry.】

item.title: 苹果公司在反垄断上诉中没有得到德国法官的同情
item.description: 德国联邦法官周二表示，他们可能会在与苹果公司的法律战中支持德国反垄断监管机构，此前他们就美国科技巨头是否应受到额外管制的问题进行了三个多小时的审议。【原文：German federal judges indicated on Tuesday that they could back the country's antitrust regulator in a legal battle with Apple , following over three hours of deliberations over whether the U.S. tech giant should be subject to additional controls.】

item.title: 食品供应商 Sysco 保持全年预期不变，尽管季度业绩有所增长
item.description: 包装食品和生鲜食品供应商 Sysco 周二维持其全年销售额和利润预期不变，尽管第二季度收入超出预期，原因是餐馆需求的复苏仍不均衡。【原文：Packaged and fresh food supplier Sysco on Tuesday kept its full-year sales and profit forecasts unchanged despite beating estimates for second-quarter revenue, as a recovery in demand from restaurants remains uneven.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空股价在单位收益和成本预测令人失望后下挫
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周二预测，第一季度成本上升，单位收入低于分析师预期，导致这家总部位于纽约的航空公司股价在早盘交易中下跌 14%。【原文：JetBlue Airways forecast higher costs and unit revenue below analysts' expectations for the first quarter on Tuesday, sending the New York-based carrier's shares down 14% in morning trade.】

item.title: 贝恩资本拟收购 Surgery Partners 剩余股份
item.description: 本周二的一份文件显示，贝恩资本私募股权公司（Bain Capital Private Equity）提议以每股 25.75 美元的价格收购其尚未持有的外科设施运营商 Surgery Partners 的剩余股份。【原文：Bain Capital Private Equity has proposed to acquire the remaining shares of surgical facility operator Surgery Partners it does not already own for $25.75 apiece, a filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官表示不担心特朗普的关税威胁
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）周二表示，他对特朗普政府威胁对贸易伙伴征收关税 "并不太担心"，其中包括作为波音公司遥远供应链重要组成部分的国家。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg said on Tuesday he is "not too worried" about the Trump administration's threats to impose tariffs on trade partners, including countries that are important parts of Boeing’s far-flung supply chain.】

item.title: 雪佛龙与 1 号引擎、GE Vernova 合作，为美国数据中心提供动力
item.description: 能源巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周二表示，该公司已与投资公司 Engine No.【原文：Energy major Chevron said on Tuesday it has signed an agreement with investment firm Engine No. 1 and GE Vernova to build natural gas-based power plants to run co-located data centers in the U.S.】

item.title: 星巴克北美总裁卸任
item.description: 星巴克周二表示，其北美总裁萨拉-特里林（Sara Trilling）将在任职近三年后卸任。【原文：Starbucks said on Tuesday its North American president Sara Trilling would be stepping down after nearly three years at the role.】

item.title: 美国 11 月房价增长放缓
item.description: 由于较高的抵押贷款利率抑制了需求，增加了市场上的房屋供应量，11 月份美国独户住宅价格温和上涨。【原文：U.S. single-family house prices increased moderately in November as higher mortgage rates curb demand, boosting the supply of homes on the market.】

item.title: NextEra Energy 的 XPLR 基础设施公司因暂停派息而股价下跌
item.description: 公用事业公司 NextEra Energy 旗下的 XPLR 基础设施公司周二表示，将无限期暂停派息，导致该公司股价在盘前交易中下跌 23%。【原文：XPLR Infrastructure , a unit of utility firm NextEra Energy , said on Tuesday it will suspend its dividend for an indefinite period, sending the company's shares down 23% in premarket trade.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称德意志银行中国合资公司谈判因控制权分歧而终止
item.description: 消息人士称，德意志银行及其资产管理部门 DWS 与中国贷款机构中国邮政储蓄银行（PSBC）就在中国成立合资企业的谈判破裂，原因是德意志银行拒绝了中国政府增持股份的要求。【原文：Talks between Deutsche Bank , its asset management arm DWS and Chinese lender Postal Savings Bank of China (PSBC) over a joint venture in China have collapsed after the German firm resisted Beijing's request to boost its stake, sources said.】

item.title: 美国 12 月核心资本货物订单增幅超预期
item.description: 12 月份，美国主要制造业资本货物的新订单增幅超过预期，但由于波音公司的罢工中断了飞机的交付，第四季度的商业设备支出可能受到抑制。【原文：New orders for key U.S.-manufactured capital goods increased more than expected in December, but business spending on equipment was likely muted in the fourth quarter after a strike at Boeing disrupted aircraft deliveries.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克与挪威财富基金首席执行官发生冲突；"朋友就是朋友
item.description: 据周二公布的一份谈话记录显示，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）与挪威主权财富基金首席执行官尼古拉-唐根（Nicolai Tangen）发生了冲突，而后者是这家汽车制造商的主要投资者之一。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk has clashed with Nicolai Tangen, CEO of Norway's sovereign wealth fund, one of the automaker's top investors, according to a record of the conversation released on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿根廷取消对低成本电动车和混合动力车的关税，并削减部分汽车税费
item.description: 阿根廷经济部长周二表示，阿根廷下周将取消对部分低成本电动车和混合动力车的进口关税，同时削减对高价位汽车和摩托车的税收。【原文：Argentina next week will lift import tariffs on some low-cost electric and hybrid vehicles, while cutting taxes on higher-priced cars and motorcycles, the nation's economy minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 宝马预计全年利润率在 6-7% 目标的下半部分
item.description: 宝马汽车公司周二在其网站上发布的幻灯片显示，该公司预计第四季度的税前利润将大大低于去年同期，全年利润率将处于其 6%-7% 目标的下半部分。【原文：BMW expects its earnings before taxes in the fourth quarter to be significantly below last year and for its full-year margin to be in the lower half of its 6-7% target, according to slides posted on the carmaker's website on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，摩根大通看中了金丝雀码头前瑞士信贷大厦的空间
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，摩根大通正在洽谈租用瑞士信贷位于金丝雀码头的空置旧办公室，因为摩根大通在附近的欧洲总部已经不够用了。【原文：JPMorgan is in talks to take overflow office space in Credit Suisse's empty former offices in Canary Wharf, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters, having outgrown its own European headquarters nearby.】

item.title: 水泥生产商泰坦美国在美国首次公开募股中寻求高达 33 亿美元的估值
item.description: 总部位于比利时的水泥生产商泰坦美国公司周二表示，将在纽约首次公开募股时寻求最高 33.2 亿美元的估值。【原文：Titan America is seeking a valuation of up to $3.32 billion in its New York initial public offering, the Belgium-based cement producer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 富国银行称 CFPB 2022 年同意令已终止
item.description: 富国银行周二表示，其与消费者金融保护局就汽车贷款、消费者存款账户和抵押贷款达成的 2022 年同意令已被终止。【原文：Wells Fargo said on Tuesday its 2022 consent order with the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau related to automobile lending, consumer deposit accounts and mortgage lending has been terminated.】

item.title: 人工智能数据初创公司图灵将收入增加两倍，达到 3 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能数据初创公司图灵（Turing）是为人工智能实验室提供人类培训师的越来越多的公司之一，该公司周二表示，随着实现盈利，其去年的收入增加了两倍，达到了 3 亿美元。【原文：Artificial intelligence data startup Turing, one of a growing number of companies that provide human trainers to AI labs, said Tuesday its revenue tripled to $300 million last year as it reached profitability.】

item.title: 尼尔森称，节日欢乐有助于迪士尼保持 12 月电视收视领先地位
item.description: 据尼尔森公司周二发布的最新报告显示，在假日电影马拉松和有线电视网络强劲表现的推动下，华特-迪士尼公司 12 月份在美国电视收视份额上继续保持领先地位。【原文：Walt Disney maintained its lead in U.S. TV viewing share in December, bolstered by holiday movie marathons and strong performances across its cable networks, according to Nielsen's latest report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 在 QXO 恶意收购之后，Beacon Roofing 采用了毒丸疗法
item.description: Beacon Roofing Supply 公司周二表示，在 QXO 公司提出恶意收购要约后，该公司已通过了一项有限期的股东权利协议（俗称毒丸）。 .【原文：Beacon Roofing Supply said on Tuesday it has adopted a limited duration stockholder rights agreement, commonly known as a poison pill, following a hostile takeover bid by QXO .】

item.title: 文件显示，卖空者安德鲁-勒夫寻求撤销美国欺诈案
item.description: 据周一提交给联邦法院的一份文件显示，著名做空者安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）正在向法官施压，要求驳回美国对他操纵市场并通过对公司的负面报道欺诈投资者的指控。【原文：Prominent short seller Andrew Left is pressing a judge to dismiss U.S. charges that he manipulated the market and defrauded investors with his negative reports about companies, according to a document filed in federal court on Monday.】

item.title: 受 F-35 技术升级影响，洛克希德-马丁公司对 2025 年利润前景持谨慎态度
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）周二预计，2025年的利润将低于华尔街预期，这家国防巨头正在努力解决F-35战机技术升级延迟推出的问题，在全球紧张局势不断加剧的情况下，凸显了今年谨慎的基调。【原文：Lockheed Martin forecast 2025 profit that missed Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, as the defense giant grapples with delayed rollouts of a tech upgrade on the F-35, underscoring a cautious tone for the year amid rising global tensions.】

item.title: DeepSeek 创始人梁文峰关注中国创新
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的创始人、39 岁的梁文峰在短短几周内成为中国科技行业的代言人，也成为中国克服美国日益收紧的出口管制的希望所在。【原文：Liang Wenfeng, the 39-year-old founder of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, has in the matter of weeks become the face of China's tech industry and its hope of overcoming an ever-tightening noose of export controls imposed by the United States.】

item.title: 巴西 Pix 系统的新功能将吸引 300 亿美元的电子商务付款
item.description: 金融技术公司 Ebanx 周二进行的一项研究显示，巴西支付系统 Pix 将在两年内处理 300 亿美元的电子商务支出，其经常性账单的新功能将使流媒体公司受益。【原文：Brazil's payment system Pix is seen handling $30 billion in two years in e-commerce spending with a new feature for recurring bills that should benefit streaming firms, a study from financial technology firm Ebanx showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通选择里德负责政府和医疗保健业务
item.description: 摩根大通周二任命柯蒂斯-里德（Curtis Reed）为这家美国最大银行的政府银行业务以及医疗保健、高等教育和非营利银行业务的主管。【原文：JPMorgan Chase named Curtis Reed on Tuesday as chief of the largest U.S. lender's government banking and healthcare, higher education and not-for-profit banking businesses.】

item.title: 波音公司报告亏损 118 亿美元，创 2020 年以来最大亏损额
item.description: 波音公司周二报告年度亏损 118.3 亿美元，创下 2020 年以来的最大亏损额，原因是该公司正努力解决其商业和国防部门的问题，以及美国西海岸工厂工人瘫痪性罢工造成的影响。【原文：Boeing on Tuesday reported an annual loss of $11.83 billion, its largest since 2020, as it grappled with problems at its commercial and defense units and the fallout from a crippling strike by U.S. West Coast factory workers.】

item.title: RTX 因飞机零部件和维修需求强劲而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 本周二，航空航天和防务巨头 RTX 公布季度利润增长，原因是航空公司为应对喷气式飞机短缺问题而改飞维护密集的老旧飞机，从而使对其飞机零部件和维修服务的需求受益。【原文：Aerospace and defense major RTX posted a rise in quarterly profit on Tuesday, as demand for its aircraft parts and repair services benefited from airlines flying older, maintenance-intensive planes to cope with a jet shortage.】

item.title: 巴西政府支持 Gol-Azul 合并以加强航空业
item.description: 巴西港口和机场部长告诉路透社，巴西 Gol 航空公司和 Azul 航空公司计划合并，这将加强巴西航空业，防止任何一家公司倒闭。【原文：A planned merger between Brazilian airlines Gol and Azul would strengthen the sector and prevent either company from failing, Brazil's ports and airports minister told Reuters, giving the potential move a key government nod.】
